events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect order fulfillment by the customer.
Customer support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case for this customer.
Hello, I am Sarah from customer support. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to assist with the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 982374 and I have attached a photo clearly showing the incorrect item I got.
Thank you for the details. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate you handling this promptly and look forward to the refund.
We have completed the refund process on our end. Please allow a few days for the funds to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and that everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
Since the refund has been confirmed received, we are closing your case. Thank you for contacting support.
